sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Preventing Youth Vaping Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Preventing Youth Vaping Act.

sections.heading: Additives. An electronic cigarette for sale in this State shall not include the following additives:
sections.text: Additives. An electronic cigarette for sale in this State shall not include the following additives:

sections.heading: Manufacturer requirements.  A manufacturer shall ensure that the label on an electronic cigarette container meets the nicotine addictiveness warning statement requirements under 21 CFR 1143

Severability. If any provision of this Act or its application to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the invalidity of that provision or application does not affect other provisions or applications of this Act that can be given effect without the invalid provision or application
sections.text: Severability. If any provision of this Act or its application to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the invalidity of that provision or application does not affect other provisions or applications of this Act that can be given effect without the invalid provision or application.
